name: Frame-Perfect Flower
description:
Have you ever heard a speedrunner or commentator say that a trick is "frame-perfect" and wonder what that means or whether it's accurate or just short-hand for precise?  In Frame-Perfect Flower, you're given five frame-perfect inputs in a row to hit to help a flower grow.

There are two game modes, 30 frames per second and 60 frames per second, the most likely frame rates for a video game, depending on the era.  The higher the frame rate, the more accurate you have to be!

Plus, there's a timer running the whole time, so you can compete to get the best score.
